column5: Would like to take a day trip to Lac Seul in a couple of weeks and wondered if someone could suggest a guide. Thanks

Skylane, Be careful when hiring a guide. There are many good ones and a few bad ones. Get them to tell you as much about their services and equipment as possible. Also tell them your needs and expectations. It's like bird dogs - a good one makes for a great day. A bad one makes you want to shoot your hunting buddy. Good Luck Bigfish
Big Fish, I want to see you complete a few more anger management classes before we go out on that Fly-out!! Ivy
It depends on what end of the lake you are going to . I would be happy to suggest guides on the Nw corner of the lake. You can emai me at [email protected] good luck on your search

Last year a friend and I used Terry Williams from Sleepy Dog Cabins.He brought 10 dozen minnows and we went through them all.Pam at Four Seasons Bait set us up with him.She also had names many other guides for Lac Seul.

Skylane . . . What part of the lake are you interested in fishing. This truely makes a big difference, as most guides know only sections of the lake particularly well. I have guided the south-central and southwest-central area of the lake for several years.
Really does not matter what part of the lake, though I will be coming up from Dinorwic. Would just like to get into some nice fish. My e-mail ad is [email protected] Thanks Steve
Pat, tried to e-mail but it would not go through. My e-mail ad is [email protected]. Thanks
[email protected] There is a #1 after lacseul, sorry. Will email you sunday
